snippet: Gov. Rick Snyder vetoed measures that would have required photo identification before an absentee ballot could be obtained.
abstract: Michigan Gov Rick Snyder, who is a Republican, vetoes two bills that would have required photo identification before an absentee ballot could be obtained; vetoes are an election-year rarity for the party, which has pressed for tougher voter identification laws nationwide.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Rick Snyder vetoed measures that would have required photo identification before an absentee ballot could be obtained.

headline.seo: Voter ID Bills Rejected by Michigan Gov. Rick Snyder
headline.main: Republican Governor of Michigan Rejects Voter ID Bills
headline.print_headline: Republican Governor of Michigan Rejects Voter ID Bills
